languages.text: С годами одержимость и темные склонности Заккари Вайса проявляли себя все сильнее. Хор его пополнялся пленными астропатами с разоренных Вольных Торговцем миров и кораблей. Окруженный сонмом призраков, загубленных варпом, он восседал за живым органом из плоти, играя для Имматериума симфонию отчаяния.

As years passed, Zacchary Weisz's obsession and his dark proclivities grew ever more apparent. His Choir was replenished with captive Astropaths from worlds and ships ransacked by the Rogue Trader. A ghostly gathering of souls taken by the warp would surround him as he sat behind an organ of living flesh and played upon it a symphony of despair, the Immaterium his only audience.
languages.original_text: С годами одержимость и темные склонности Заккари Вайса проявляли себя все сильнее. Хор его пополнялся пленными астропатами с разоренных Вольных Торговцем миров и кораблей. A ghostly gathering of souls taken by the warp would surround him as he sat behind an organ of living flesh and played upon it a symphony of despair, the Immaterium his only audience.

languages.text: Als die Jahre vergingen, wurden Zacchary Weiszs Besessenheit und seine dunklen Neigungen immer offensichtlicher. Sein Chor wurde mit gefangenen Astropathen verschiedener Welten und Schiffe erneuert, die {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} plünderte. Eine geisterhafte Versammlung von Seelen, die dem Warp zum Opfer gefallen waren, scharte sich um ihn, als er an einer Orgel aus lebendigem Fleisch eine Sinfonie der Verzweiflung anstimmte, deren einziger Zuhörer das Immaterium war.
languages.original_text: As years passed, Zacchary Weisz's obsession and his dark proclivities grew ever more apparent. His Choir was replenished with captive Astropaths from worlds and ships ransacked by the Rogue Trader. A ghostly gathering of souls taken by the warp would surround him as he sat behind an organ of living flesh and played upon it a symphony of despair, the Immaterium his only audience.

traits.locale_text: Als die Jahre vergingen, wurden Zacchary Weiszs Besessenheit und seine dunklen Neigungen immer offensichtlicher. Sein Chor wurde mit gefangenen Astropathen verschiedener Welten und Schiffe erneuert, die {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} plünderte. Eine geisterhafte Versammlung von Seelen, die dem Warp zum Opfer gefallen waren, scharte sich um ihn, als er an einer Orgel aus lebendigem Fleisch eine Sinfonie der Verzweiflung anstimmte, deren einziger Zuhörer das Immaterium war.

languages.text: Au fil des années, l'obsession et les sombres penchants de Zacchary Weisz devinrent de plus en plus évidents. Il regarnit les rangs de son chœur avec des astropathes capturés sur les mondes et vaisseaux pillés par {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}. Entouré d'âmes en peine happées par le Warp, il se façonna un orgue de chair et de sang et se mit à jouer une symphonie de désespoir, avec l'Immaterium pour seul public.
languages.original_text: As years passed, Zacchary Weisz's obsession and his dark proclivities grew ever more apparent. His Choir was replenished with captive Astropaths from worlds and ships ransacked by the Rogue Trader. A ghostly gathering of souls taken by the warp would surround him as he sat behind an organ of living flesh and played upon it a symphony of despair, the Immaterium his only audience.

traits.locale_text: Au fil des années, l'obsession et les sombres penchants de Zacchary Weisz devinrent de plus en plus évidents. Il regarnit les rangs de son chœur avec des astropathes capturés sur les mondes et vaisseaux pillés par {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}. Entouré d'âmes en peine happées par le Warp, il se façonna un orgue de chair et de sang et se mit à jouer une symphonie de désespoir, avec l'Immaterium pour seul public.

languages.text: Con el paso de los años, la obsesión de Zacchary Weisz y sus tendencias oscuras se volvieron cada vez más aparentes. Reponía las pérdidas de su Coro con Astrópatas capturados en los mundos y las naves que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente saqueaba. Una espectral hueste de almas consumidas por la disformidad lo rodeaba al teclado de un órgano de carne viva en el que tocaba una sinfonía de desesperación con el Inmaterio como único público.
languages.original_text: As years passed, Zacchary Weisz's obsession and his dark proclivities grew ever more apparent. His Choir was replenished with captive Astropaths from worlds and ships ransacked by the Rogue Trader. A ghostly gathering of souls taken by the warp would surround him as he sat behind an organ of living flesh and played upon it a symphony of despair, the Immaterium his only audience.

Reponía las pérdidas de su Coro con Astrópatas capturados en los mundos y las naves que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente saqueaba. languages.text: 年月が経つにつれて、ザッカリー・ワイズの妄執とその邪悪な性癖は一層顕著になっていった。彼の聖歌隊は、ローグトレーダーが荒らした惑星や船で捕らえられた感応通信官によって補充された。<歪み>に取り込まれた魂の亡霊のような集団が彼を取り囲む中、彼は生きた肉体のオルガンの前に座り、唯一の観衆である非物質世界に向けて、絶望のシンフォニーを奏でた。
languages.original_text: As years passed, Zacchary Weisz's obsession and his dark proclivities grew ever more apparent. His Choir was replenished with captive Astropaths from worlds and ships ransacked by the Rogue Trader. A ghostly gathering of souls taken by the warp would surround him as he sat behind an organ of living flesh and played upon it a symphony of despair, the Immaterium his only audience.

traits.locale_text: 年月が経つにつれて、ザッカリー・ワイズの妄執とその邪悪な性癖は一層顕著になっていった。彼の聖歌隊は、ローグトレーダーが荒らした惑星や船で捕らえられた感応通信官によって補充された。<歪み>に取り込まれた魂の亡霊のような集団が彼を取り囲む中、彼は生きた肉体のオルガンの前に座り、唯一の観衆である非物質世界に向けて、絶望のシンフォニーを奏でた。

languages.text: 随着时间流逝，扎卡里·威茨的痴迷与阴暗的倾向变得越发明显。他的唱诗班的所有成员，都是从被行商浪人洗劫过的世界与舰船中补充而来的。每当他坐在由活生生的肉体组成的风琴后面，演奏着绝望的交响乐时，一大群被亚空间残害的灵魂便会聚集在他周围，而他唯一的听众就是亚空间本身。
languages.original_text: As years passed, Zacchary Weisz's obsession and his dark proclivities grew ever more apparent. His Choir was replenished with captive Astropaths from worlds and ships ransacked by the Rogue Trader. A ghostly gathering of souls taken by the warp would surround him as he sat behind an organ of living flesh and played upon it a symphony of despair, the Immaterium his only audience.

languages.text: Zacchary Weisz'ın takıntısı ve karanlık eğilimleri, yıllar geçtikçe daha aşikâr hâle geldi. Hür Tacir'in yağmaladığı dünyalardan ve gemilerden gelen Astropat tutsakları Korosuna kattı. Canlı dokudan yapılma bir orgun başına oturup çaresizlik senfonisini çalmaya başladığında öteboyutun bünyesine kattığı ruhlarla dolu ürkütücü bir güruh etrafını sarardı. Tek dinleyeni ise Tindiyardı.
languages.original_text: As years passed, Zacchary Weisz's obsession and his dark proclivities grew ever more apparent. His Choir was replenished with captive Astropaths from worlds and ships ransacked by the Rogue Trader. A ghostly gathering of souls taken by the warp would surround him as he sat behind an organ of living flesh and played upon it a symphony of despair, the Immaterium his only audience.
